messages.message:
Yeah there are a few things I want to unpack here!
• 1000 fields is well beyond what we can support today (are these within a single class?) 
    ◦ @Sanch / @Raul Mächler I think we need to understand the use case a bit more. 
• As Serena mentioned, we closed this ticket out since we did not hear much demand for this. We can re-open this but but also I'd want to qualify how big of a pain point this is before we consider prioritizing this.
@Raul Mächler can assist with more info as he discussed this with the prospect - thanks!

Hello. Yes, Kering mentioned about 1000 fields.
TBH, i think the request was more like a super exotic request and was more to understand if we can do that or not.

If needed, I can follow up with Kering to understand if
1. this request will occur multiple time or if its a 1 time
2. little bit more about the use case and why they have 1000 fields
